body.name: Himalaya Radiant Glow Fairness Face Wash for Clear, Glowing Skin, and Pore Minimizer for Even Skin Tone 3.38 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 7 mins
features: WITH SAFFRON & CUCUMBER: For a fresher, smoother complexion and for toning and tightening pores while leaving your skin soft and smooth
IDEAL FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: A soap-free, daily-use face wash that softens, hydrates and nourishes your skin while giving you a glowing, healthy-looking complexion
DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED: Enjoy the sensory pleasure of a rich, daily face wash that is mild, comfortable and non-drying on your skin
FREE FROM COMMON CONCERNS: Includes ingredients for quality and stability, but remains free from other ingredients such as phthalates, SLS, SLES and parabens
CRUELTY FREE: We care about our furry friends. That’s why we never test our personal care products on animals

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HIMALAYA RADIANT GLOW FAIRNESS FACE WASH IS DESIGNED WITH YOU IN MIND For a cleaner, more luminous, vibrant new you, let Himalaya Radiant Glow Fairness Face Wash light up your mornings and brighten your face in the mirror. This luxurious soap-free herbal formulation is enriched with a reviving combination of Saffron, Cucumber and Alfalfa to leave your skin feeling fresh and clean, and to treat you to a healthier, more luminous complexion. Himalaya Radiant Glow Fairness Face Wash is suitable for all skin types and leaves you with an awakening glow and a nourishing hydration you’ll see and feel right away.

WHAT MAKES HIMALAYA RADIANT GLOW FAIRNESS FACE WASH DIFFERENT? Himalaya marries luxurious Saffron and rejuvenating Cucumber not just to treat you, but to soothe and complete you. This comforting pair of herbal actives combines elements of luxury, brightness, rejuvenation and cleanliness to smooth your complexion, tighten your pores and reduce the appearance of dark spots and dullness, leaving your skin softer and fresher, more hydrated and nourished. Alfalfa and Pomegranate join in the formula for gentle cleansing and extra hydration, leaving the skin with nutrients for healthy-looking natural fairness that glows. WHAT'S IN HIMALAYA RADIANT GLOW FAIRNESS FACE WASH, AND WHY IS IT ONE OF THE BEST FACE WASHES ON THE MARKET? Saffron is a luxurious herb used in skin care for centuries for a brighter and smoother complexion Cucumber is an excellent toner that helps tighten pores, while antioxidants in Cucumber rejuvenate the skin and leave it feeling soft and smooth Alfalfa is a nutrient-rich chlorophyll-containing plant used for centuries to promote clean and healthy skin Pomegranate contains antioxidants which protect against free radicals generated by the environment while it softens, hydrates and nourishes the skin Free from parabens, SLS/SLES and phthalates

HIMALAYA IS PROUD TO BE DIFFERENT? Himalaya is a family-owned company founded in 1930 with products sold in over 90 countries. Integrating the principles of Ayurveda and modern science, Himalaya is a worldwide pioneer in the field of herbal health and body care. Himalaya believes in community health, sustainable farming and environmental responsibility – part of their ongoing commitment to Happiness through Wellness.

THE STORY Family owned since its beginning in 1930, the Himalaya legacy now spans over 85 years, stretching from one man, to his son, to his grandson — from India to a global presence. Through the work of over 8,000 employees, products are sold in over 90 countries, with one product sold every 1/16th of a second. Himalaya products are based on the wisdom of Ayurveda, India’s well-respected traditional system of medicine and advancements in modern science. THE SCIENCE Himalaya’s R&D department employs over 250 physicians and scientists, and is recognized by India’s Institute of Health Sciences as an approved PhD Center. The R&D facility is Good Laboratory Practices and Good Clinical Practices certified. Himalaya’s manufacturing facility is Good Manufacturing Practices certified. THE MISSION From the beginning, Himalaya’s mission has been to research nature and enrich lives. This is achieved in part by ensuring everyone the opportunity to purchase pure and effective products at a value. Philanthropic practices are intrinsic to the inherent disposition of the company. Himalaya teaches their family of farmers to grow native plants sustainably on their land without the use of harsh chemical fertilizers or pesticides, educates thousands of children, has planted over 200,000 trees worldwide, supports the survival of indigenous tribes, donates to community needs, and cares about its employees – all an important part of doing business. Himalaya believes that if wellness is the path to happiness, we must all contribute to the wellness of all things. Wellness of people, wellness of the environment, wellness of our communities – all part of the vision for Happiness through Wellness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice product with great smell
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Very nice face wash. I got frustrated with so many face wash products from different international brands and finally stick to it . It had great smell, fresh punching fragrance that kick start your day.I feel very happy every time I use it.It’s worth for the every penny you spent on it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It actually worked!
reviews.reviewText: As someone who haș worked in business- I wasnt sure what to make of the reviews. I get very agitated with shallow, quick fix soluțions. I cringe at many salespeople. I’d describe myself as a more skeptical consumer who often bucks the consensus.Now I must start out by saying-i have been drinking more water lately. I drink 2-3 glasses per day as opposed to before when i was just always dehydrated. I’ve also used some oil on my face sporadically.Anyhow, one day I looked in the mirror and my skin was truly radiant. It was like the color was in my face again. I wondered if I still hâd make-up on! Then I struggled to remember if I went tanning, but it was raining last week. After using this producț I feel more comfortable going make-up free for the first time in 8-10 years. I have very sensitive, combinațion skin.I have to say I was surprised! It seems țo be a good product. Not sure how much that means anymore... Lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great service but the product itself isnt good
reviews.reviewText: Great fragrance, good foam, just very very drying. I have to moisturizer with a bunch of serum after I use this face wash because my face is so dry its hard to move.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love the way my face feels and looks after using this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This face wash has a very strong fragrance. It’s pretty overwhelming. It has a very thick consistency and doesn’t seem to clean well. It also doesn’t rinse off easily. I won’t repurchase it, but it might work for other people!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars EXPIRED 10 YEARS AGO!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Today is 2/11/22. This Item was delivered yesterday showing an expiration of 2013. Unfortunately I already washed my face, I was looking forward to a cucumber scent. My face feels irritated. I can’t believe I was sent such an old product, for the face at that. Almost 10 years old wow. Never again. BUYER BEWARE!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very natural and feels great
reviews.reviewText: My favorite ever face wash. It never causes any allergies nor dryness like some of the deep cleansing face gels do. my skin feels soft and smooth. it also smells very nice but not overwhelming. I keep using it for many years now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans and hydrates.

reviews.reviewText: This is a good brand but the one I received was expired and I didn’t feel like to use ..it could damage the skin ….please see manufacturing date and expiry date when you receive

Ce n'est pas le pire produit que j'ai essayé mais pas le meilleur non plus. Après la douche j'ai hâte d'appliquer ma crème faciale pour hydrater ma peau car je sens que le produit m'assèche un peu la peau.
It’s used tube. More then quarter tube is empty .
